definitions.example: Come in, out of the cold.

definitions.definition: (with 'the') A harsh place; a place of abandonment.
definitions.example: The former politician was left out in the cold after his friends deserted him.

definitions.definition: A common, usually harmless, viral illness, usually with congestion of the nasal passages and sometimes fever.
definitions.example: I caught a miserable cold and had to stay home for a week
